Vulnerability.Title: mailx bug fix update
Vulnerability.Description: The mailx packages contain a mail user agent that is mostly used to manage mail using scripts. For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7.4 Release Notes linked from the References section. Users of mailx are advised to upgrade to these updated packages. Note for remediation: Please disable the SELinux for RHEL 4/5 when repairing, or some rpm packages will fail to install.
